about_the_game:
Welcome to Mega Button Soccer! A new version of the famous button soccer game, now adapted with exciting new features. Combining traditional button soccer elements with a fun story and charismatic characters.





Play as Cauã Silva, live his passion for the sport and meet the characters participating in this journey while trying to unravel the mysteries of Aru-Açu Island.


ARCADE


Follow the adventure of the young button soccer enthusiast, who has the dream of becoming the biggest competitor on the island!





The journey will not be easy! Cauã will face some of the best button soccer players in the country! But with his presence and charisma on the pitch, he's determined to make his dream come true!

FRIENDLY MATCH


Play custom matches! Play with a variety of characters in arenas you've unlocked in Arcade mode.


TOURNAMENT


In the grandiose Button Cup you will face a chain of characters in the keying. Become a champion and receive the glorious Cup!





Tournament mode brings a total of seven cups, that will be unlocked as you progress through Arcade mode.

PLAYABLE CHARACTERS


You can choose from a selection of iconic characters, each with their own distinct attributes and play style. Some are fast and skilled, while others are strong and powerful. But for sure you will have fun with playing with everyone!


VARIETY OF ARENAS


Mega Button Soccer also features a variety of unique arenas to play in, each representing your nationality!





Mega Button Soccer is for everyone, from button soccer lovers to those who have never played but want to experience this adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3240 3.4GHZ (or equivalent); AMD Athlon 64 (or equivalent).
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 5005U (or equivalent); AMD A8 6410 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
